item.title: Does anyone know how to do these? Tutorials plz
item.dc:creator: @t3h_0wn4g3 t3h 0wn4g3
item.description:
@t3h_0wn4g3 wrote:

changing the max lvl

Search for this in your client.java

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

it should look something like this

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 135;
}[/code]

To change the level change the 135, or whatever number you have there.

Read full topic
